data.question: What is the formula unit of ACM-1?
What method was used to confirm the structure of ACM-1?
True or False: ACM-1 has a 3-D micropore structure.
What is the BET surface area of ACM-1 using CO2?
What changes occur to ACM-1 upon treatment with (Me2S)­AuCl?
data.answer: The crystallites turn from emerald green to a darker gray color and the bulk shows distinct changes to the PXRD pattern.

data.question: True or False: The Au–ACM-1 samples contained larger Au(0) species.
What is the short-range Au···Au contact distance in the Au dimers generated in Au–ACM-1?
True or False: The BET surface areas of Au–ACM-1 are higher than for the parent ACM-1.
What is the H2 capacity of Au–ACM-1 at 77 K, 0.95 atm?
True or False: Au–ACM-1 shows enhanced solid-state luminescence compared to ACM-1.
What is the emission peak observed at 489 nm for Au–ACM-1 attributed to?
data.answer: A ligand-based transition that is not observed for the free ligand.

data.question: True or False: The excited state lifetimes for ACM-1 and Au–ACM-1 are shorter than the lifetime of free TPPA.
What is the main challenge in preparing SSL-MOFs with chelate sites?
data.answer: It is difficult to control MOF assembly on a level that permits the formation of structurally precise chelate sites.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of ACM-1 involves the use of a pyridyl-functionalized triarylarsine ligand.
What is the significance of the cis-As2 sites in ACM-1?
data.answer: They are too distal to readily chelate low-valent metals without further modification.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of TPPA involves lithium-halogen exchange and Suzuki coupling.
What is the role of the rigidity of the MOF in the formation of Au dimers in Au–ACM-1?
data.answer: The rigidity of the MOF acts as a unique solid-state ligand, inducing exceptionally short aurophilic bonds.

data.question: True or False: The postsynthetic metalation of ACM-1 with AuCl under facile conditions was studied by single-crystal X-ray diffraction.
What is the main advantage of using MOFs as solid-state ligands (SSLs)?
data.answer: They support the confinement of unusual low-valent coordination complexes within their micropores.

data.question: True or False: Organoarsines are more basic than organophosphines.
